general.title: Warehouses
general.subtitle: Create warehouses to manage your available stocks.

list.textDeleteConfirm-1: Deleting a warehouse removes all associated stocks.
list.textDeleteConfirm-2: Are you sure you want to delete the warehouse
list.whitespaceSubTitle: Create warehouses to manage your available stocks.

warehouseMessages.noRuleAssignedMessage:
The configuration of some Warehouse groups is ignored because no rule is assigned. Without a rule, your Warehouse group has no responsibility and is not functional.
Assign a rule or create a new rule via the Rule Builder to give your groups responsibility.
Affected Warehouse groups: {warehouseGroups}

detail.title: Warehouse
detail.textDeleteWarehouseWarning: Deleting this warehouse will be permanent.
detail.textDeleteConfirm-1: Deleting a warehouse removes all associated stocks.
detail.textDeleteConfirm-2: Are you sure you want to delete the warehouse
detail.helpTextGroups: Use groups to organise your warehouses and assign rules to manage warehouse responsibilities for your different business cases.
